nasascience_1969136581815550042.content: After exploring innovative and cost-effective approaches, @NASA has selected @blueorigin to deliver the VIPER rover to the Moon! VIPER will search for vital resources like water ice to support a long-term human presence on the lunar surface. dir="ltr" href="https://t.co/kOIXqlRj56" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" target="_blank" role="link" style="color: rgb(29, 155, 240);">go.nasa.gov/47NrRx3
